alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 4:02PM MDT until June 23 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL GOSHEN AND CENTRAL PLATTE COUNTIES... At 402 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chugcreek, or near Wheatland, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wheatland, Guernsey, Lingle, Fort Laramie, Chugcreek, Lakeview North, Bordeaux, Westview Circle, Y-O Ranch, Fort Laramie National Historic Site, Slater, Grayrocks Reservoir and Guernsey Campground. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 63 and 106. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Wyoming. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
